Package org.variantsync.diffdetective.feature

Class CPPAnnotationParser

java.lang.Object
org.variantsync.diffdetective.feature.CPPAnnotationParser
public class CPPAnnotationParser extends Object
A parser of C-preprocessor annotations.
Author:
Paul Bittner

    CPPAnnotationParser()
    Invokes CPPAnnotationParser(PropositionalFormulaParser, CPPDiffLineFormulaExtractor) with the default formula parser and a new CPPDiffLineFormulaExtractor.

    Creates a new preprocessor annotation parser.

  • Field Details

    • Default

      public static final CPPAnnotationParser Default
      Default CPPAnnotationParser. Created by invoking CPPAnnotationParser().

  • Constructor Details

    • CPPAnnotationParser

      public CPPAnnotationParser()
      Invokes CPPAnnotationParser(PropositionalFormulaParser, CPPDiffLineFormulaExtractor) with the default formula parser and a new CPPDiffLineFormulaExtractor.

    • CPPAnnotationParser

      public CPPAnnotationParser​(PropositionalFormulaParser formulaParser, CPPDiffLineFormulaExtractor extractor)
      Creates a new preprocessor annotation parser.
      Parameters:
      formulaParser - Parser that is used to parse propositional formulas in conditional annotations (e.g., the formula f in #if f).
      extractor - An extractor that extracts the formula part of a preprocessor annotation that is then given to the formulaParser.

  • Method Details

    • parseDiffLine

      public org.prop4j.Node parseDiffLine​(String line) throws IllFormedAnnotationException
      Parses the condition of the given line of source code that contains a preprocessor macro (i.e., IF, IFDEF, ELIF).
      Parameters:
      line - The line of code of a preprocessor annotation.
      Returns:
      The formula of the macro in the given line. If no such formula could be parsed, returns a Literal with the line as name.
      Throws:
      IllFormedAnnotationException - when CPPDiffLineFormulaExtractor.extractFormula(String) throws.
